titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on acrylic staple fibers, dyed but not carded, combed, or otherwise processed for spinning, with a cut fiber length of 100 mm to 135 mm and a target length of 120 mm.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/10/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on acrylic staple fibers, dyed but not carded, combed, or otherwise processed for spinning, with a cut fiber length of 100 mm to 135 mm and a target length of 120 mm.
